comment: 🙏🏻 @sainsburys We’re on the verge of Leaving you forever. Keep your staff & shoppers safe.  Supermarkets are extremely DANGEROUS places. We saw a lady in 80’s in @sainsburys crying this week because of the danger. Tell staff to remove shoppers coughing more than 2 minutes.🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻
amr:
# ::snt 🙏🏻 @sainsburys We’re on the verge of Leaving you forever. Keep your staff & shoppers safe.  Supermarkets are extremely DANGEROUS places. We saw a lady in 80’s in @sainsburys crying this week because of the danger. Tell staff to remove shoppers coughing more than 2 minutes.🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (v / verge-01
            :ARG1 (y / you)
            :ARG2 (l / leave-15
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 y
                  :duration (f / forever)))
      :snt2 (k / keep-02
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (s / safe-01
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (s2 / staff
                              :poss y2)
                        :op2 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (s3 / shop-01)))))
      :snt3 (p2 / place
            :ARG0-of (e / endanger-01
                  :degree (e2 / extreme)))
      :snt4 (s4 / see-01
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (c / cry-02
                  :ARG0 (l2 / lady
                        :mod (d / date-entity
                              :decade 80)
                        :location (c2 / company
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Sains"
                                    :op2 "Burys")))
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (d2 / danger)))
            :time (w2 / week
                  :mod (t / this)))
      :snt5 (t2 / tell-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y2
            :ARG1 (r / remove-01
                  :ARG0 (s5 / staff)
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (s6 / shop-01))
                  :ARG2 (c4 / cough-02
                        :ARG0 p3
                        :quant (m2 / more-than
                              :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 2
                                    :unit (m3 / minute)))))
            :ARG2 s5))
